import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroVideo':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/hero.mp4'), } const a = { 'text':'Businesses such as Network Rail that manage shared spaces are looking for joyful interactions to surprise and delight and increase satisfaction for their customers while they wait. The environments can cause negative emotions for customers, such as overcrowding and unexpected delays.', 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/1.png'), } const b = { 'title':'Process', 'text':'As part of a comprehensive research and testing process, we visited train stations, spoke to passengers and staff and interviewed station managers and transformation teams. We assembled a focus group that assisted in creating our original designs, and presented our ideas at an Innovation Pitch in December. Our final idea was extensively tested on our user group in situ and iterated, and the feedback will inform the next iterations. Throughout, we focused on real-world feasibility.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/2.png'), } const d = { 'title':'London Bridge Station', 'text':'', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/4.jpg'), } const e = { 'title':'Brompton Bicycles', 'text':'', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/4.jpg'), } function JoyStory(props) { return(
) } export default JoyStory;
